original_text: “Truly I tell you, if anyone says to this mountain, ‘Go, throw yourself into the sea,’ and does not doubt in their heart but believes that what they say will happen, it will be done for them.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 누구든지 이 산더러 들리어 바다에 던져지라 하며 그 말하는 것이 이루어질 줄 믿고 마음에 의심하지 아니하면 그대로 되리라

sentences.original_text: if anyone says to this mountain
Go, throw yourself into the sea
and does not doubt in their heart
but believes that what they say will happen
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 자기가 말하는 것이 이루어질 것을 믿는다면

sentences.original_text: it will be done for them
